mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news ( title, author, create_time, content, count, category_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{author}, #{createTime}, #{content}, #{count}, #{categoryId} )
mapper.select: SELECT n.id, n.title, n.author, n.content, c.name FROM news n LEFT JOIN news_category c ON n.category_id = c.id WHERE n.id=#{id}
